item.title: Can You Play Marvel Rivals on PS4?
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/can-you-play-marvel-rivals-on-ps4/

The PlayStation 5 has long since replaced the PlayStation 4 as the de facto Sony gaming console. However, if Marvel Rivals is on PS4, it would incorporate a ton of extra players who are yet to upgrade to the latest generation of hardware.

Marvel Rivals is a technical…marvel. It looks stunning and its cel-shaded graphics pop on modern-day consoles and the latest PC rigs. Not only this, but a 6v6 match featuring a constant stream of projectiles, moving parts, and superhero taunts requires a lot of manpower. If you want to play Marvel Rivals on the PS4 though, it opens up a new line of questioning.

NetEase surely wants as many people playing the hero shooter as possible, but technical limitations are a constant barrier for many AAA games nowadays. Let’s see what the developer decided for Marvel Rivals and its PS4 fate—we already know its PS5 compatibility.

Is Marvel Rivals on PS4?

Marvel Rivals is not available to play on PS4. Developer NetEase has restricted the free-to-play shooter’s platform releases to the PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

It’s a sad, harrowing reality of gaming in 2024. The PlayStation 4 (and its Pro upgrade) were once considered the pinnacle of console gaming. Now, they are becoming relics companies hardly take time to consider. Marvel Rivals isn’t alone in this neglect—so think twice before harboring a grudge!

I’m no expert, but I think it has a lot to do with developers unwilling to devolve their vision for a title. For example, a PS5 has a lot more power than the PS4, and therefore the main development is done with the PS5 in mind. A PS4 is very limited compared to its younger brother, and sacrifices need to be made.

As we’ve seen with Switch ports trying to imitate titles released on superior hardware, a dumbed-down version of a game isn’t necessarily worthwhile—or reflective of its quality. Therefore, many new releases are kept for PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC. It doesn’t necessarily a PS4 port is dead as stranger things have happened.

The Marvel Rivals release FAQ mentions “Steam, PlayStation, Xbox, Epic Store, and our official website (Loading Bay)” as the available platforms—not specifying which versions of those platforms. So if you’re a PS4 user desperate to yeet Captain America’s shield like a boomerang, all isn’t completely lost. We’ll update this guide in case anything changes.

Do you think I’m being hopelessly optimistic? Or does hope spring eternal? We’ll have to see, but let us know what you think below. For more Marvel Rivals content, check out the complete Trophies and Achievements list, and the latest on leaked characters coming to the F2P shooter.

item.title: Space Marine 2’s Obelisk Update is Live Now
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/space-marine-2s-obelisk-update-is-live-now/

Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2’s 5.0 update introduces an Obelisk Operation, a new enemy and much more. 

Space Marine 2 Obelisk Update Details 

Space Marine 2’s Obelisk Operation takes players to Demerium. Here, their goal is to disrupt the flow of energy protecting an Aurora device. To do that, you must rotate a replica of the obelisk. However, the console control of the device is placed deep into the heart of a “tomb plunged into darkness”. The operation is set to occur “parallel to the final events of the campaign.”

Space Marine 2’s Obelisk Update also introduces a new Majoris enemy called Tzaangor Enlightened. This disk-flying, melee/ranged-hybrid enemy will be found in all Operations featuring the Thousand Suns and should be considered a formidable opponent when in great numbers. The way to bring them down is to catch them after a parry or during a long animation; the developers have advised using a Target Lock when facing this enemy. 

Lastly, the update also brings new Season Pass content with the Dark Angels Chapter Pack. Season Pass owners can grab Dark Angels Successor Chapters cosmetics, including Dark Angels Champion skin (Bulwark) and weapon skins for Auto Bolt Rifle, Plasma Pistol, Power Sword and Bulwark’s Storm Shield. 

Check out the full patch notes to learn about the changes to Gameplay and Balancing, Gameplay QOL, AI, Customisation, Operations, Perks, and General Fixes.

item.title: Complete Marvel Rivals Achievements & Trophies List Guide
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/complete-marvel-rivals-achievements-trophies-list-guide/

Marvel Rivals’ Trophies and Achievements require you to explore the furthest reaches of the roster to succeed. You need to master magicians and punish purveyors of chaos, so let’s take you through the whole Marvel Rivals list.

A free-to-play hero shooter sounds like a tired concept. Everything now is free-to-play, live service, and rich with cosmetics and microtransactions. Yet, Marvel Rivals has cracked the code: Enticing 10 million players in the first three days and teasing a big list of leaked characters still to come.

It has game modes galore, a multitude of multiplayer maps, and also a hefty list of extra tasks. The Marvel Rivals Achievement and Trophies list is close to being Galactus-sized, and it needs you to keep your gameplay interesting.

How Many Trophies & Achievements in Marvel Rivals?

Marvel Rivals has 41 PlayStation Trophies and a reduced figure of 40 Xbox Achievements—meaning you’ve got to be the most super of superheroes to get them all!

Trophy hunters and Achievement hoarders know the Platinum Trophy is the difference between PlayStation and Xbox. Getting every Achievement on Xbox comes with a personal smug look of satisfaction, whereas blue-brand players claim a converted Platinum Trophy. Either way, Rivals’ list is sure to take some time, and there’s a reason.

Every Marvel Rivals Achievement & Trophy

Near enough every Marvel Rivals Trophy and Achievement needs you to achieve an incredible feat using one of the F2P shooter’s many launch characters. I think it’s a great idea as the objectives are doable and logical, and encourage you to try out every hero.

Without further ado, here’s every Marvel Rivals Achievement and Trophy in its long list.
